channel.title: bm_c1a3a - Bug or missed opportunity?
channel.description:
I am loving this mod so far, but I can't help but feel that this is a missed opportunity for an environmental kill.
When you see the first HECU Marine, he's standing underneath a suspended box with what appear to be the controls nearby. Pressing the interact key or smashing the panel with the crowbar doesn't cause to box to fall and smash the guy, It doesn't appear like you can shoot the cables supporting the box either. Is this a bug, am I missing something, or is there not scripting for something like that?

item.title: bm_c1a3a - Bug or missed opportunity?
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
I ended up throwing that blue tank of bubble bath at him and just shooting that. The box drp would have been way more interesting!

Read full topic

item.title: bm_c1a3a - Bug or missed opportunity?
item.dc:creator: Zarthek
item.description:
Glad to see that I’m not the only one with this issue. Hoping that they add it in, dropping the box on him makes too much sense to not happen

Read full topic

item.title: bm_c1a3a - Bug or missed opportunity?
item.dc:creator: revel911
item.description:
Madcat1030:

I spent a solid three or four minutes trying to figure out how to drop that box. I wound up just shooting him in the head, but it felt like it was laid out too perfectly NOT to crush him.

Woudl be real cool to add this in.

Read full topic
